Detailed Description

Holder for DRM decryptors.

It is used as a container for decryptors for different crypto/drm methods, to prevent constantly calling DRM manager for creating decryptors.

bool DRMPlugin::MPEG4SinfDRMPlugin::DecryptorHolder::GetDecryptor (  IMP4SinfAtom *  sinf,
IDRMDecryptor **  decryptor
) 
 

Get DRM decryptor using information in scheme information atom.

DRM decryptor can be 0, if scheme information atom indicates that there is no protection.

Parameters:
sinf input, scheme information atom.
decryptor output, DRM decryptor.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.
